thread.title: Investors Are Still Hot For Cocoa - MoneyBeat - WSJ

author: Chelsey Dulaney
title: Investors Are Still Hot For Cocoa - MoneyBeat - WSJ
text: Whatâ€™s been the sweetest trade of 2018? Going long cocoa. Cocoa futures have surged 50% this year to $2,831 per metric ton in New York on Friday. Speculative investors have amassed bullish bets in the futures market, while another mechanism used to bet on cocoa, the iPath Bloomberg Cocoa Subindex Total Return exchange-traded note, has WSJ Wealth Adviser Briefing: Tech Stocks, Wells Fargo 401(k) Probe, Permanent Vacation Next Stocks to Watch: Sprint, Walmart, Marathon, Chipotle, Disney, McDonald's
